articles.title: A tangled web of deals stokes AI bubble fears in Silicon Valley - BBC
articles.description: Some are worried that the rapid rise in the value of AI tech companies may be a bubble waiting to burst.
articles.content:
Lily JamaliTechnology correspondent, San Francisco
Silicon Valley is home to many major tech firms, including Apple's circular headquarters
